name: Amnesiac
description: You do not know what your ability is. Each day, privately guess what it is: you learn how accurate you are.
first_night_desc: Decide the Amnesiac's entire ability. If the Amnesiac's ability causes them to wake tonight: Wake the Amnesiac and run their ability.
other_night_desc: If the Amnesiac's ability causes them to wake tonight: Wake the Amnesiac and run their ability.
